name: Concoctions and Misery
description:
A potion shop management game made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 with gameplay elements inspired by Overcooked and Diner Dash.

Features

Endless - an endless potion shop management game, so you will be competing with yourself for a highscore.

Manage a potion shop - brew potions for customers and earn coins .

Upgrades - buy items and upgrades for you and your shop at the end of each day.

Customers die! - if you don't brew their potions in time, or accidentally give them the wrong potion, they will die and you will need to dispose of their bodies.

Progressive difficulty - the plague will be getting worse by the day, so more villagers will come to your shop with only little time left in their lives.

Dev notes

Any bug reports or feedback given in the comments will be highly appreciated!
